itinerary.mapNote: Walk from Chamonix up the valley to Argentière village. 1252m.
Col de Balme 2191m border crossing into Switzerland. 1279m.
Swiss alpine lake. Fenêtre d'Arpette 2665m option. 1466m.
Bagnes valley floor. Verbier ski lifts above. 821m.

itinerary.route: Le Châble to Cabane de Louvie
itinerary.mapNote: SAC hut above Lac de Louvie. Col de Louvie 2921m. 2205m.
Remote high hut on Grande Désert plateau. 2624m.
Glaciated valley below Mont Collon. Col de Riedmatten crossed. 2006m.
Col de Torrent 2916m. Sunny terrace village above Evolène. 1667m.

itinerary.route: La Sage to Cabane de Moiry

itinerary.mapNote: Col de Sorebois 2835m. Val d'Anniviers ski resort. 1675m.
Meid Pass 2790m into Turtmanntal. Tiny hamlet. 1822m.
Final ridge descent. Matterhorn first view. 1608m.

waypoints.name: Fenêtre d'Arpette
waypoints.note: Tough alternative to Bovine route. Glacier views. Often snowfield.

waypoints.name: Col de Torrent
waypoints.note: Finest view of Dent Blanche. Wildflower meadows in season.

waypoints.name: Cabane de Moiry
waypoints.note: Above Moiry Glacier. Remote SAC hut with glacier panorama.

waypoints.name: Matterhorn
waypoints.note: Visible on approach to Zermatt. Most recognisable mountain on Earth.

waypoints.name: Augstbordpass
waypoints.note: Final high pass before Matter valley descent to St. Niklaus.

waypoints.name: Col de Balme
waypoints.note: Day 2 France–Switzerland border. First Swiss valley views.

waypoints.name: Gorner Glacier
waypoints.note: Europe's second largest glacier system. Viewable near Zermatt.
